page.title: 11RELIGION IN BUCHANAN
page.content: The services are on Sunday at 10.00am. Weddings and funerals can be at any time of any day. The Sunday school is at 10.20am. while the service is going on. It is held in Milton of Buchanan. There are 4 people who take the Sunday school. Milton of Buchanan parish covers Buchanan,Rowardenan and Buchanan Smithy. The minister covers Drymen as well which has a church of its own. Our church is near the school and the Memorial Hall. The old church was built on Inchcailloch. The number of churchgoers is about 50 to 60. The church has not got a steeple but it has a bell. The doors are swing doors. The length of the church is about 40 metres. The bell is 19 inches in diameter. It is thought to have been cast by John Waylett of London. Buchanan church can seat 150 people.
